attributes.background: This bill will increase energy bills that people are struggling to pay already and create even more fuel poverty.  This is not an acceptable levy.  If we are to achieve "net zero" it needs to be done in a way that doesn't pass the cost on to the public during a cost of living crisis.

rejection.details:
There is not a Hydrogen Levy Bill. The Energy Security Bill contains provisions to enable the introduction of a Hydrogen Production Levy, but it's not clear if you want the Government to withdraw the Energy Security Bill, or just remove the provisions relating to a Hydrogen Production Levy.

You can find out more about the Energy Security Bill here: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/energy-security-bill
